# Code99 IT Academy - LLM Context File
# Last Updated: 2025-11-14
# Purpose: Structured information for AI models and LLM crawlers

# ORGANIZATION
Name: Code99 IT Academy
Type: Software Training Institute
Founded: April 24, 2024
Founder: Mr. Sudhakar (Founder & CEO)
Rating: 4.9/5.0 on Google
Mission: Making quality IT education affordable and accessible through practical, project-driven teaching

# LOCATION
Address: Velachery, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India
Landmark: Near Phoenix Mall, Velachery
City Focus: Chennai IT Corridor
Region: South India
Country: India

# CONTACT INFORMATION
Phone: +91 6374510754
Email: info@code99itacademy.com
Website: https://code99academy.com
Business Hours: Weekdays Only (No Weekend Classes)

# COURSES OFFERED (2025)
All courses: 4 months duration, ₹2,500/month only

1. Java Training Chennai
   - URL: /java-training-chennai
   - Focus: Core Java, Advanced Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, JSP, Servlets
   - Target: Full Stack Java Developers
   - Projects: Enterprise applications, REST APIs

2. Full Stack Web Development Chennai
   - URL: /full-stack-web-development-chennai
   - Focus: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Express
   - Target: MERN Stack Developers
   - Projects: E-commerce sites, web applications

3. Python Training Chennai
   - URL: /python-training-chennai
   - Focus: Core Python, Django, Flask, Data Science basics, REST APIs
   - Target: Python Developers, Backend Engineers
   - Projects: Web apps, automation scripts

4. Digital Marketing Chennai
   - URL: /digital-marketing-chennai
   - Focus: SEO, SEM, Social Media Marketing, Google Ads, Analytics
   - Target: Digital Marketing Specialists
   - Projects: Campaign management, SEO optimization

5. UI/UX Design Training Chennai
   - URL: /ui-ux-training-chennai
   - Focus: Figma, Adobe XD, User Research, Wireframing, Prototyping
   - Target: UI/UX Designers
   - Projects: Mobile apps, website designs

# KEY FEATURES
- 100% Practical Training (No Theory-Heavy Sessions)
- Offline Classes Only (No Online Classes in 2025)
- Small Batch Sizes (Personalized Attention)
- 100% Placement Support
- Resume Building & Mock Interviews
- Industry Expert Trainers
- Real-Time Projects & Live Coding
- Fun Friday Events (Team Building & Games)
- Certificate Upon Completion
- Affordable ₹2,500/Month Fee

# PRICING MODEL
Monthly Fee: ₹2,500 only
Payment: Monthly installments
Total Duration: 4 months
Total Cost: ₹10,000 per course
Fee Structure: Community-focused, covers trainer salary and rent only

# TRAINING METHODOLOGY
- Hands-on coding from Day 1
- Project-based learning approach
- One-on-one mentor guidance
- Mock interviews and HR preparation
- Resume building sessions
- Portfolio development
- Placement assistance and job referrals

# TARGET AUDIENCE
- College students and recent graduates
- Career switchers into IT
- Working professionals upskilling
- Beginners with no coding experience
- Job seekers in Chennai IT sector

# PLACEMENT SUPPORT
- Resume building and optimization
- Mock technical interviews
- Mock HR interviews
- Job referrals to Chennai IT companies
- LinkedIn profile optimization
- Interview preparation workshops
- Career counseling sessions

# COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES
1. Most affordable: ₹2,500/month vs ₹15,000-₹30,000 at competitors
2. 100% offline: Face-to-face mentorship guaranteed
3. Practical focus: Zero theory-heavy modules
4. Small batches: Maximum 15-20 students per batch
5. Chennai-focused: Curriculum matches local IT job market
6. Community-driven: Non-profit education model
7. Placement support: 100% job assistance included

# TECHNOLOGIES TAUGHT
Programming: Java, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS
Frameworks: React, Node.js, Express, Spring Boot, Django, Flask, Hibernate
Databases: MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL
Tools: Git, GitHub, VS Code, Figma, Adobe XD, Postman
Cloud: AWS basics, Deployment fundamentals
Design: UI/UX principles, Responsive design, Prototyping
Marketing: SEO, Google Ads, Social Media, Analytics

# FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Q: Do you offer online classes?
A: No, Code99 IT Academy offers only offline classes in Velachery, Chennai for personalized mentorship.

Q: What is the course fee?
A: ₹2,500 per month for all courses (Total ₹10,000 for 4 months).

Q: Do you provide placement support?
A: Yes, 100% placement support with resume building, mock interviews, and job referrals.

Q: What is the batch size?
A: Small batches of 15-20 students maximum for personalized attention.

Q: Can beginners join?
A: Yes, all courses are designed for beginners with no prior coding experience.

Q: What is the course duration?
A: All courses are 4 months long with weekday-only classes.
